options.title: -c
options.description: clear the history list by deleting all of the entries

options.title: -d offset
options.description: delete the history entry at position OFFSET. Negative offsets count back from the end of the history list

options.title: -a
options.description: append history lines from this session to the history file

options.title: -n
options.description: read all history lines not already read from the history file and append them to the history list

options.title: -r
options.description: read the history file and append the contents to the history list

options.title: -w
options.description: write the current history to the history file

options.title: -p
options.description: perform history expansion on each ARG and display the result without storing it in the history list

options.title: -s
options.description: append the ARGs to the history list as a single entry
